title: Extremely impactful Lux bug on live - E costs double mana
body:
[This is a repost. Considering there's not even a notice thingy on the client regarding it, I can only assume it was not yet brought to Riot's attention. Deleted previous thread]

Casting E while it's mid-air to make it explode as soon as it stops will consume mana an additional time, for a total of double the mana cost.
100% reproduction rate. Should fix ASAP, as it's pretty impactful.

replies.body:
Hello hello! 

Just confirming that this is a known issue - we've got a bug logged for it. Folks should be taking a look at this once they get in. Thanks for the report. ^^

**EDIT:** Working on a hotfix!
Best of luck to them! Tell them to hurry else a light laser may hit them.. 😈
I laughed way louder than I should have! Also Katey it's ot and I don't even know who did it.. But to whoever gave us back light on the basic skins wand... Thank you ❤
:3  Oh, that was me working with MechaHawk, one of our Art Leads. He's a pretty rad dude. ^^
Katey do you know why they removed the demacia will punish you line? :(

My theory is that it didn't fit with Demacia's current lore, and Lux not being so blindly loyal to Demacia as she was pre-retcon, given their magic phobia.

On a side note, I kind of want to see what would happen if Lux chooses to join Noxus, where people are actually allowed to embrace their gifts.
That's hilarious, and something I wouldn't have noticed for a while since I max Q first now. Good eye

In support it can be played around, using e to zone from the wave is a good strategy especially if it makes hitting q easier due to dodge e pathing. In mid it makes Lux unplayable, you oom at level 2 if you try to poke opponent, you get outraded in a 1 vs 1 if you only land q+ auto, you loose the little pressure you have if you leave it on the ground only to waveclear. Hope they fix soon!
